Translations.Text: Say, "Travel on earth and then see what end the rejecters met with

Ask, "To whom does all that is in the heavens and the earth belong?" Say, "To Allah. He has made mercy an obligatory attribute of Him Himself. He will certainly gather you on the Resurrection Day, wherein there is no doubt. Those, who have lost their souls, believe not
And to Him belongs what lives by the night and the day. And He is the One Who hears, the One Who knows

Say, "Shall I take for a wali anyone instead of Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, and Who feeds and is not fed?" Say, "I am indeed commanded to be the first among those who submit." And be not you, of the polytheists
Say, "I do indeed fear punishment on a dreadful Day, if I disobey my Lord
He/she from whom it is averted on that day, Allah surely has shown mercy to him/her. And this is the most manifest success
And if Allah afflicts you with some harm, there is none to take it off but He. And if He gives you something good, then He it is Who is able to do anything
And He it is Who has Supreme Power over His creatures. And He is the Most Wise, the One Who knows about all things

Ask them what thing is the weightiest in testimony? Say, "Allah! HE is witness between you and me. And this Qur'aan has been revealed to me so that I may, therewith, warn you and warn whomsoever it reaches. Do you really bear witness that there are other gods with Allah?" Say, "I do not bear witness." Say, "HE is the One and Only Being worthy of worship, and, indeed, I am free of the belief in those whom you set up as partners to Allah
Those whom We have given the Book recognize him as they recognize their sons. Those who have lost their souls â€” they will not believe
